experience.title: experience
experience.description:
I am a dedicated Full Stack Developer with a flair for transforming ideas into impactful digital solutions. With expertise spanning both front-end and back-end technologies, I've successfully led a wide array of projects across different industries, consistently pushing the boundaries of innovation.

My journey includes professional experience as a Web Developer at Inventiv IT and a thriving freelance career, where I’ve delivered tailor-made solutions that exceed client expectations.

hard-skills.title: hard-skills
hard-skills.description:
As a full-stack developer, I leverage a comprehensive skill set to deliver high-quality web solutions across the entire development stack.

My front-end expertise includes HTML5 and CSS3, with frameworks such as Tailwind and Bootstrap, and advanced JavaScript development using Vue.js and Nuxt.js for server-side rendering and optimized performance.

I am adept in UML and Merise for effective system modeling and design.

On the back-end, I utilize PHP frameworks like Symfony and Laravel, and manage various database systems including MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and Redis.

My development practices are rooted in Agile methodologies (Scrum), and I use a range of tools including Git/GitHub for version control, Postman and Swagger for API testing and documentation, Jira for project management, and Docker and AWS for efficient deployment and scalability.

Additionally, I have experience with GraphQL for flexible API queries and CI/CD pipelines to streamline development and deployment processes.

soft-skills.title: soft-skills
soft-skills.description:
As a freelancer, I bring a unique blend of soft skills that complement my technical expertise.

I excel in communication, ensuring clear and effective interactions with clients to understand their needs and deliver tailored solutions.

My problem-solving abilities allow me to tackle complex challenges and find innovative solutions.

I am highly adaptable, thriving in dynamic environments and managing multiple projects simultaneously.

My strong organizational skills and attention to detail ensure timely and high-quality deliverables, while my commitment to continuous learning keeps me at the forefront of industry trends.

bio.title: bio
bio.description:
About me
With 2 years of experience in web development, I am a passionate and dedicated full-stack developer committed to delivering exceptional web solutions. My journey has been marked by a strong focus on creating impactful and user-centric applications that drive meaningful results.

I have developed a keen ability to adapt to diverse project needs and collaborate effectively with clients to achieve their goals.

interests.title: interests
interests.description:
I Have a deep passion for exploring new technologies and trends in web development, which fuels my drive to create innovative solutions. Outside of coding, I enjoy staying active through various hobbies and spending time with family and friends.

I am particularly interested in how emerging technologies can transform industries and improve user experiences. My curiosity and enthusiasm for continuous learning keep me engaged and motivated in both my professional and personal life.

education.title: education
education.description:
Education and Certifications

Full-Stack Developer Training
YouCode, created in partnership with OCP and Simplon, offers a comprehensive full-stack developer training program that combines pedagogical excellence with the latest technologies. This program, in collaboration with UM6P, has equipped me with the skills and knowledge needed to excel in modern web development.

Bachelor's Degree in Physical Sciences
This foundational education provided a strong background in scientific principles and analytical thinking, which supports my problem-solving skills in software development.

Certifications:

Certified Full-Stack Web Developer – FreeCodeCamp
This certification covers key technologies and methodologies in full-stack development, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, and React.

JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures – FreeCodeCamp
Focuses on mastering JavaScript algorithms and data structures, enhancing problem-solving skills and code efficiency.

Front-End Web Developer Nanodegree – Udacity
Provides in-depth knowledge of front-end development technologies and best practices, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

Responsive Web Design Certification – FreeCodeCamp
Emphasizes creating responsive and accessible web designs, ensuring a consistent user experience across devices.

PHP & MySQL Certification – Codecademy
Covers essential skills for back-end development using PHP and MySQL, including database management and server-side scripting.
